import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; import './ManageZone.css'; const ManageZone = () => { const [zones, setZones] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8080/zones/all') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setZones(data)) .catch((err) => console.error('Failed to fetch zones:', err)); }, []); return ( <>
